name: chromium-mask
description: Makes Chromium browsers (Opera, Brave, Edge, Vivaldi, Arc, etc.) compatible with sites requiring mainstream browsers.
author: mr-september

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true});"
scripts.build: npm run clean && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist');" && node build.js
scripts.build-simple: npm run clean && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist');" && node build.js --simple
